location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly, Aboo [Ābu] to Percy William Powlett

mods.abstract: Letter regarding a pending question on change in the system of customs and whether it relates to salt specifically or is a more general question.The letter also asks if Powlett would be willing to act in Harrowlee [Hāraoti] should Berkeley return home as it could provide a useful sphere for him with plenty of work and an opportunity to sketch those states under his charge for a gazetteer.
